rrpss

Class OrderInvoice

  • Object
    • OrderInvoice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OrderInvoice
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores information about the order invoice in the Restaurant. This class will keep track of the purchase (Order) made by the Customer, calculate the final price (grandTotal that Customer has to pay, and print the order invoice (consist of Order details and price breakdown). Before finding the grandTotal, OrderInvoicewill first compute the totalPrice, which is the sum up the price of all items that Customer purchased (both AlaCarte and SetPackage are considered) multiplied with its ordered quantity. At this stage, grandTotal will be made equal to totalPrice. Afterwards, OrderInvoice will check whether Customer is a member of the Restaurant.If yes, then the Customer will receive 10% DISCOUNT from the original grandTotal and totalDiscount would be subtracted from the grandTotal. The final price, grandTotal is then calculated by adding the totalGST to totalPrice. The GST is obtained by multiplying 7% to grandTotal
    Author:
    Deka Auliya Akbar
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • GST

        private static final double GST
        Is the tax rate for Goods and Services Tax. Here, the GST is 7% of the total purchase price grandTotal. The totalGST will be added to the grandTotal. And the result is the amount of price a Customer has to pay. GST rate is constant, hence it is final.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISCOUNT

        private static final double DISCOUNT
        Is the discount rate for members in the restaurant. Here, the Discount rate is 10% of the total purchase price grandTotal. The totalDiscount will be subtracted from the grandTotal for all the members in the Restaurant. Discount rate is fixed, therefore it is final.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • totalPrice

        private double totalPrice
        Is the sum of all orders, which include both the price of AlaCarte and SetPackage multiplied with corresponding requested quantities.

      • order

        private Order order
        Is the order object that customer has requested. An order will contains menu item that a customer purchased ( AlaCarte and SetPackage ), date and time of the Order object creation, the Staff object who created the Order. This object also has print method to print out the Order details.

      • tableId

        private int tableId
        Is the table identifier, to indicate from which Table the Order is made.

      • membership

        private boolean membership
        Specify whether a customer who ordered is a member of the Restaurant.

      • totalDiscount

        private double totalDiscount
        totalDiscount is the discounted amount of price to be subtracted from grandTotal. It is calculated by multiplying DISCOUNT with grandTotal. This totalDiscount will only be computed when the Customer is a member of the Restaurant

      • totalGST

        private double totalGST
        totalGST is the amount of tax to be added to the grandTotal. It is calculated by multiplying GST with grandTotal.

      • grandTotal

        private double grandTotal
        grandTotal is the final amount of price that a Customer hsa to pay. This final price is calculated by adding the totalGST to grandTotal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderInvoice

        public OrderInvoice(Order order,
            boolean membership,
            int tableId)
        Construct an OrderInvoice object. This constructor will initialize the attributes of OrderInvoice.
        Parameters:
        order - is the Order objects, and assigned to order at initialization
        membership - is the status of customer membership in the restaurant The membership status of a Customer could only either true or false, and assigned to membership at initialization
        tableId - is the id of the Table object and assigned to tableId at initialization Each table has unique id to differentiate between different tables. This id is very similar to table number in real world. totalPrice, grandTotal, totalGST and totalDiscount are initialized to 0 This constructor will call calculateTotalPrice() to compute the total price that a customer must pay after GST and membership discount

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTotalPrice

        public void calculateTotalPrice()
        This method will calculate the totalPrice, totalDiscount, totalGST and grandTotal. It will iterate through all the menu item exist in the Order object, which is stored in HashMap data structures, which exist for both AlaCarte and SetPackage. For each item, the price will be multiplied with the requested quantity and the result is added up to the totalPrice. grandTotal is computed by subtracting totalDiscount if Customer is a member of the Restaurant and adding the totalGST.

      • getOrder

        public Order getOrder()
        Returns Order object from the Customer.
        Returns:
        Order object requested by the Customer.

      • getTotalPrice

        public double getTotalPrice()
        Returns the totalPrice of all items purchased/ordered.
        Returns:
        the totalPrice of the purchase.

      • getTotalDiscount

        public double getTotalDiscount()
        Returns the totalDiscount, the value is 0 if the Customer is not a member of the Restaurant
        Returns:
        the total discount.

      • getTotalGST

        public double getTotalGST()
        Returns the totalGST of the purchase.
        Returns:
        the total tax

      • getGrandTotal

        public double getGrandTotal()
        Returns the grandTotal, which is the final amount of price Customer has to pay.
        Returns:
        grandTotal of an Order.

      • printInvoice

        public void printInvoice()
        This method will print the Order details, which breakdown of each menu item and the quantity that Customer purchase, the date and time when the Orderis created, and also display the price breakdown, from the totalPrice, membership totalDiscount, totalGST, and the final amount, grandTotal.
